entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Authentication validation failed with error - InvalidToken exception on .net 7 and .net 8 preview 6 #88874
  • Improve enum parsing in config binder generator #88873
    8.0.0
  • Mono.Linker.Tests.TestCases.All.DynamicDependencies test failure #88870
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async.FailedRequests_ConnectionClosedWhileReceivingHeaders_Recorded timed out #88868
  • ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests.CompileFails.VerifyByValueMarshallingAttributeUsage tests are failing #88867
    8.0.0
  • Audit how we surface diagnostics from the config binding generator and how users might suppress them #88865
    8.0.0
  • Process.WaitForExit always times out after a different particular process runs #88862
  • InlineArrayInvalid needs to be converted to il #88861
  • [NativeAOT] Add appropriate telemetry flags to track use of NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #88844
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBinderTests.GetCanReadStaticProperty failed #88843
  • AccessViolationException or InvalidOperationException thrown in local method with .NET 8 preview 7 nightly #88842
    8.0.0
  • PhiDefinitions are not zero cost #88841
    Future
  • Path for ICU_DAT_FILE_PATH when targeting iOS inside an XCTest bundle #88835
    8.0.0
  • Using SocketsHttpHandler over HttpClientHandler #88834
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationClientServer.CertificateValidationClientServer_EndToEnd_Ok on Windows AoT #88832
  • [7.0] Can't exec into pod anymore (exit code 138 - SIGBUS) - increased memory with net7.0 #88824
  • Generate more efficient ARM64 prologs/epilogs #88823
  • Test failures in WPF #88822
  • [mono][aot] Disable marshal-ilgen on iOS when not needed #88820
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.Packaging.ZipArchive: No means to set the zip header bits 1 and 2 #88812
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294.cmd #88808
  • [JIT] ARM64 - NonVirtual method call slower inside of a loop than a Virtual method call #88807
  • [7.0] Failure "rid win-x86 portable incremental-native-build rootdir" #88806
    7.0.x
  • Documentation status of NullabilityInfoContextSupport and _AggressiveAttributeTrimming #88805

Closed

  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] COM interface methods decorated with ObsoleteAttribute generate CS0612 warnings #88813
    8.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator warns twice on some warnings: once when generating the managed wrapper and another when making the native wrapper #88540
  • iOS app crashes on device in release build (IPA) #75758
    8.0.0
  • ToUpper not working as intended with Turkish Culture #77689
    8.0.0
  • Fuzzlyn failure on linux arm64 #88616
    8.0.0
  • Long Running Test: Interop/MonoAPI/MonoMono/PInvokeDetach/PInvokeDetach.sh #73040
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Separating the common UDT types using Microsoft.SqlServer.Server NuGet package #66531
    Future
  • [CoreCLR] UnsafeAccessorAttribute: Missing static modifier check for field #88858
    8.0.0
  • incorrect kind of datetime data #76353
  • Missing libSystem.Net.Security.Native.so when publishing self-contained single-file project on Linux #88481
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.RentReturnArrayPoolTests<Byte> #75690
    8.0.0
  • [macOS] Potential perf regression in Timer #59150
    8.0.0
  • Multi-platform compilation: System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.GetSection throws error on NetCoreApp #930
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Pass Meter to HttpClientHandler and SocketsHttpHandler #86961
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: pass custom tags for metrics enrichment in HttpClientHandler #86281
    8.0.0
  • CollectionsMarshal AsSpan #88845
  • ComInterfaceGenerator provides confusing warning for arrays with [InAttribute] #88205
    8.0.0
  • VectorDot test failes in codegen #88704
  • ComInterfaceGenerator emits method attributed with [UnmanagedCallersOnly] and `in` `out` or `ref` parameters. #82581
    8.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator produces two SYSLIB1051 on [In] parameters without [Out] #87824
    8.0.0
  • Does ServicePointManager still work in .NET 7 for HttpClient calls or is it "dead code"? #88814
  • Confusion between Avx.IsSupported and Vector256.IsHardwareAccelerated #88828
  • Feature request: treat Memory/ReadOnlyMemory<T> as T[] in System.Text.Json #86442
    8.0.0
  • Methods that are 'async void' allocates even though the method is able to complete synchronously #88818
  • [mono][interp] Speed up invoke path #79029
    8.0.0
  • CoreCLR tests on Mono runtime : System.InvalidProgramException: float conv.ovf.un opcodes not supported #34084
    8.0.0
  • Visual Studio 2022 v17.6.5 can not build dotnet 6.0.20, but v17.6.4 is OK. #88732
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer ,need complier error if target class have no pubic memeber #87520
  • Native->Managed (.net core) step-in not working in Visual Studio #85339
    8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Type System.ReadOnlySpan`1[T] is not a ByRefLike type so ref field, '_reference' is invalid #81438
    Future
  • [mono][aot] Propose initialization of nollvm methods without a PLT entry #83376
    Future
  • Better error message for * Assertion at /Users/runner/work/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/marshal-ilgen.c:6204, condition `sig->param_count == invoke_sig->param_count + 1' not met #46926
    8.0.0
  • APICompat for ref-pack servicing #42961
    8.0.0
  • Int128TestFieldLayout test failing on NativeAOT #74549
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.ProduceDiagnosticFromOtherAssemblyTest #88579
    8.0.0
  • The JIT is trying to compile all instantiations for Vector`1 once Span is used #88312

PullRequests

Created

  • Light up Ascii.IsValidCore with Vector512 code path #88872
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Enable ExtendedProtectionPolicy in generic System.Net.Security build #88871
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix `TimeZoneInfo.Equals` and `TimeZoneInfo.HasSameRules` #88869
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Expose the DegreesToRadians and RadiansToDegrees APIs #88866
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Configure SocketsHttpHandler for HttpClientFactory with IConfiguration #88864
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Move GetMethodTable and IsReference to JIT #88860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump semver from 7.3.7 to 7.5.4 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-webpack #88857
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution, javascript
  • Strip trivia from tokens. #88856
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Skip RC2 encrypted PKCS12 files on Android for iteration counting #88854
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, test-bug
  • Extend SocketsHttpHandler Connection and Request telemetry #88853
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Enable StressLogAnalyzer to read stress logs from old coreclr running with a new clrgc. #88852
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Register a callback that tries to load other versions Open LDAP library if the default is failed #88851
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Simplify condition to detect recursive inlining #88849
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that IsSupported being false disables the tracked hierachy in our tests #88848
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Enable dynamic linking for maccatalyst in sandbox environment #88847
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, os-maccatalyst, 8.0.0
  • [browser] detect and assert engine features #88846
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Ensure that INumberBase implements IUtf8SpanFormattable #88840
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Ensure that IsPow2 for floating-point numbers correctly take subnormal values into account #88839
    area-System.Numerics
  • Generates a guid for activity id #88838
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Don't crash the trim analyzer if it finds unrecognized nodes in the input #88836
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Bump semver from 7.3.7 to 7.5.4 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/node-webpack #88833
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution, javascript
  • [mono][sgen] Log also size of reserved empty major blocks #88825
    area-GC-mono
  • [browser] testing major_free_swept_blocks #88821
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Add docs on using Bionic with NativeAOT #88817
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clean up the optimizing.md document #88816
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add an option to not generate precise GC info #88811
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [7.0] Backport "Fix MSBuild integration for the host build with CMake 3.26" #88809
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Don't fallback to PNSE, and give a more descriptive error message. #88804
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Respect CopyOutputSymbolsToPublishDirectory in PublishAot #88815
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure GCHeap related debugging still works even when we use newer CLRGC to target older runtimes #88457
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Avoid leaking committed bytes for large pages #87977
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Suppress Obsolete warnings in the ComInterfaceGenerator #88859
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Explicitly set dotnet root when building tools #88801
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Mark replacements as dirty after setting GTF_VAR_DEATH #88669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Fix deadlock in pinvoke detach test #88855
    area-VM-threading-mono, needs-area-label
  • [libs][Unix] Fix UTC alias lookup #88641
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [JIT] Added BEGIN and END anchors for disasm output #88782
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing sections in implicit machine.config #88553
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add EnumBuilder implementation and other changes #88503
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Update enum value and assert #88830
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove `DelegateInvokeStubManager` #88683
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Do not say the wrong default behavior for blittable arrays in ComInterfaceGenerator warning #88212
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Ensure Vector256.Dot produces a V256 result #88712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't generate Unmanaged-to-Managed stubs with diagnostics #88679
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Deduplicate diagnostics emitted for managed->unmanaged and unmanaged->managed stubs #88803
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Migrate more Blazor features, prepare JavaScript API for Blazor cleanup #87959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Skip RC2 encrypted PKCS12 files on Android for iteration counting #88787
    area-System.Security, test-bug
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    blocking, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Ensure DOTNET_MaxVectorTBitwidth is interpreted as a decimal based input, not hexadecimal #88761
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JSON: Add support for {ReadOnly}Memory<T> #88713
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [browser] revert active issue https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/88728 #88831
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Implement Inline TLS field access for LoongArch64. #88819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [mono][tests] Attempt to enable test #88722
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Write perfmap and jitdump files to /tmp by default #88776
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Clean up usings in test cases assembly #88678
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, linkable-framework, community-contribution

Updated

  • Remove createdump's DAC dependency for the PAL for NativeAOT #88802
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Enable SxS workload manifests #88781
    area-Workloads
  • Flush the gclog after GC #88222
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Light up core ASCII.Utility methods with Vector256/Vector512 code paths. #88532
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Improve `File.Copy` by using the block copy operation for ReFS on Windows #88695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Total time in GC counter #88699
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Feature to be able to selectively deoptimize methods #88797
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Mark final types as exact #88163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2221515 #88636
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Restructure NegotiateAuthentication implementation #87930
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Light up Ascii.Equality.Equals and Ascii.Equality.EqualsIgnoreCase with Vector512 code path #88650
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Remove handwritten binding logic from Logging.Console; use generator instead #88067
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Use latest chrome for testing #88505
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Try to fix missing libc++.so.1 errors in arm64 llvmaot perf run #88705
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add public MethodInvoker and ConstructorInvoker classes #88415
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Write perfmap and jitdump files to /tmp by default [6.0 port] #88486
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [Mono] UnsafeAccessorAttribute non-generic support for field #88626
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono]: Add dotnet-gcdump support. #88634
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • SBLK_MASK_LOCK_THREADID allow tid up to 65535 #88772
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][debugger] Support new JMC #86815
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Implement reabstraction in CoreCLR for Static Virtual Methods #88711
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • Extend JsonSourceGenerationOptionsAttribute to have feature parity with JsonSerializerOptions. #88753
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix reading metadata info after applying changes #88685
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Convert RuntimeHelpers intrinsics to JIT ones #88543
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] mono_exit improvements #88387
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Make firing of ETW events in nativeaot opt-in via the enabled/disabled lib #88800
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [libs][iOS] Disable constant propagation and unify `System.Linq.Expression.dll` build for all platforms #88723
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Enable new analyzers CA1862, CA1864 in runtime and fix findings. #88700
    area-Meta
  • EventPipe support for ProcessInfo #87562
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Get DataContractSerializer to behave nicely with unloadable AssemblyLoadContext #88791
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • OpenSSL ENGINE support #88656
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Enabled embedded broadcast for binary ops #87946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • wrap exceptions from callbacks in QuicError.CallbackError #88614
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize const ShiftRightLogical for byte values on XArch #86841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Support filtering property names on dictionary deserialization #87868
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Reduce number of gen 2 GC under high memory load #83328
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Fixes for outerloop-mono.yml #88743
    area-Build-mono
  • Add System.Net.NameResolution metrics #88773
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Intrinsify UTF16->UTF8 conversion for string literals (Encoding.UTF8.TryGetBytes) #85328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Trim XmlSerializers codegen if unsupported #88796
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Fire AssemblyUnloadStarted event #87890
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #88664
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 6.0.x
  • Testing CI #87536
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Add support for mobile devices in processinfo3 test #88655
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Remove ThunkPool crst. #88778
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify ldftn reverse lookups #88719
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Presize dictionary in regex interpreter #88558
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write/Copy, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
